title: Grenier completes Roma loan move
text:
0 Jan 28, 2017 20:28:39 The Serie A side have signed the midfielder for the rest of the season, but have the option to purchase the 26-year-old in the summer 
Clement Grenier's loan move from Lyon to Roma has been completed. 
The five-time France international, last capped in a friendly against Paraguay in June 2014, arrived in the Italian capital on Friday for a medical, with Roma announcing the official completion of the deal a day later. 
Man City hint at bright future 
Grenier moves to Serie A until the end of the season, when Roma will have an option to make the switch permanent. 
The 26-year-old attacking midfielder had fallen out of favour at Lyon, where he made just four substitute appearances in Ligue 1 this season. . @clemgrenier will wear the No. 7 shirt. pic.twitter.com/tMJ5fdZ8mg â€” AS Roma English (@ASRomaEN) January 28, 2017 
Grenier has been with Lyon for his entire professional career, making his debut in September 2009. 
Roma travel to Sampdoria in Serie A on Sunday. Related
